import Example from './../../../../guideline-app/app/ui/components/example/Example';
import Alertstripe from 'NavFrontendModules/nav-frontend-alertstriper';
import {
    HamburgerButton,
    MenuButton,
    SystemButton,
    NextButton,
    BackButton,
    XButton,
    SearchButton
} from 'NavFrontendModules/iconbuttons';

## Tilbake-/NextButton

<Example>
    <BackButton />&nbsp;<NextButton />
</Example>

```jsx
import { BackButton, NextButton } from 'nav-frontend-ikonknapper';

<BackButton />
<NextButton />
```

## SearchButton

<Example>
    <SearchButton />&nbsp;
</Example>

```jsx
import { SearchButton } from 'nav-frontend-ikonknapper';

<SearchButton />
```

    <SearchButton>
        <span>Valgfri tekst</span>
    </SearchButton>

